Interface UserRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryUserRepository
public interface UserRepository
repository interface that defines persistence operations for user accounts supports storage, lookup, existence checking, and category retrieval

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    exists(String id)
    check whether a user already exists
    Optional<User>
    findById(String id)
    find a user using internal id value
    Optional<User>
    findByLoginId(String loginId)
    find a user by login credential field (email or id based on role)
    List<CompanyRepresentative>
    getAllCompanyRepresentatives()
    retrieve all company representative accounts
    List<Staff>
    getAllStaffs()
    retrieve all staff accounts
    List<Student>
    getAllStudents()
    retrieve all stored student accounts
    void
    save(User user)
    save or update a user account in persistent storage

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<User> findById(String id)
      find a user using internal id value
      Parameters:
      id - identifier used to locate user
      Returns:
      optional containing user if found, else empty

    • findByLoginId

      Optional<User> findByLoginId(String loginId)
      find a user by login credential field (email or id based on role)
      Parameters:
      loginId - login identifier entered during authentication
      Returns:
      optional containing matching user if found, else empty

    • save

      void save(User user)
      save or update a user account in persistent storage
      Parameters:
      user - user entity to store

    • exists

      boolean exists(String id)
      check whether a user already exists
      Parameters:
      id - identifier to be checked
      Returns:
      true if exists, false otherwise

    • getAllStudents

      List<Student> getAllStudents()
      retrieve all stored student accounts
      Returns:
      list of student records

    • getAllCompanyRepresentatives

      List<CompanyRepresentative> getAllCompanyRepresentatives()
      retrieve all company representative accounts
      Returns:
      list of company representative records

    • getAllStaffs

      List<Staff> getAllStaffs()
      retrieve all staff accounts

      list of staff records
